mapper.select: SELECT s.goods_num, s.update_time, s.create_time, g.goods_name, g.goods_model, g.goods_brand, a.admin_name, s.price FROM stock_into_log s, goods g, admin a WHERE s.goods_id = g.goods_id AND s.admin_id = a.admin_id ORDER BY s.create_time DESC

SELECT g.goods_name AS goodsName, SUM(s.goods_num) AS total FROM goods g, stock_into_log s WHERE s.goods_id = g.goods_id AND s.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND g.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND s.create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY g.goods_name
